pages.title: Cake Vaults
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Cake Vaults$() are special Vaults, where you have to find a $(#033dfc)Cake$() in each room you go through, to progress to the next one. You have to consume a $(#033dfc)random amount of Cakes$(), displayed at the bottom of your screen.

pages.title: Special Aspects
pages.text: For each Cake that you consume, you have the chance of adding any random modifier there is, $(#f00)(excluding Locked)$().$(br2)Upon clicking the last cake, you will be teleported out of the Vault and receive a $(#033dfc)Crake$().

To roll this Objective, you need to apply a $(#033dfc)Cake$() to a $(l:get_started/vault_crystal)Vault Crystal$() if the Crystal is not exhausted.$(br2)Upon applying, you cannot add any additional modifiers to the Crystal.
